text:
In WebTesting: Http Authorization, when you enter a password (from the Add 
dialog), the user interface shows "*" instead of the actual characters you 
type.  However, when you finishing entering the fields in the dialog and click 
OK, the actual password (not the "*") is shown in the Http Authorization table.
creator: khammond25@home.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
